description:
Gorou is a student of the Mistilteinn academy. He has an upbeat "class rep" personality. He`s a talented pilot and seen by many as one of the most well-valued parasites in Cerasus. He`s old friends with http://anidb.net/ch92216 [Hiro] and http://anidb.net/ch92211 [Ichigo]. His Franxx partner is Ichigo.
Source: Darling in the Franxx Wiki
name: Gorou
